comments:
Build: I20070220-1330

I finished making an edit on a large Java file, and then clicked on the outgoing change node in the synchronize view to open a compare editor.  The compare editor came up completely blank, and the following error was in the log.  I could not reproduce - when I closed the compare editor and reopened, it worked fine.
